Description.Text: Hospederia Puente de Alconetar is a charming 4-star establishment offering warm hospitality, efficient service and comfortable accommodation in the heart of Garrovillas de Alconetar. It boasts an elegant interior with modern comforts and an outdoor swimming pool. The hotel is situated in Plaza Mayor, built between the 15th and 16th centuries and now declared as a Spanish National Artistic and historical Monument, in the peaceful town of Garrovillas de Alconetar. It is within driving distance of both Alcantara Reservoir and the city of Caceres, which has been declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Various historic attractions are located in Garrovillas de Alconetar and in the Caceres province, including Alconetar Bridge as well as numerous cathedrals, churches and palaces. In a seamless fusion of old and new, the hotel occupies an unimposing yet impressive stone palace that has been fully-restored to create beautifully-appointed communal areas which combine the building's original features with discreet modern comforts. Onsite facilities include an outdoor swimming pool where guests can cool off after relaxing on a sun lounger. Complimentary wireless internet is accessible throughout the hotel for added convenience. Standard guestrooms showcase an elegant decor with stone walls, exquisite furniture, wooden floors and pristine private bathrooms. They are equipped with contemporary amenities tailored to the needs of modern travelers, including free Wi-Fi and a 32-inch LCD television with satellite channels. The hotel's restaurant serves a varied breakfast buffet as well as mouthwatering regional delicacies and traditional Spanish dishes accompanied by fine wines. Meanwhile, the cafe is a great place to unwind with refreshing beverages and tasty snacks. The hotel offers a 24-hour reception. Free public parking is available onsite.
